idea-plugin.name: Base16 Brush Trees

Base 16 Brush Trees for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Abraham White <abelincoln.white@gmail.com>. Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
